hero.title: England's Largest Thatched Pub Reborn
hero.subtitle: Authentic Nepalese cooking, cask ales and community spirit opposite Waterbeach green.

promos.title: Quiz Night Wednesdays
promos.body: Gather the village for our weekly quiz with Nepalese bar snacks and Sky Sports atmosphere.

promos.title: Takeaway Fridays
promos.body: Call 01223 375578 for Bhutuwa chicken, momo and Gurkha lager to enjoy at home.

promos.title: Sunday Masala Roast
promos.body: Slow-roasted meats brushed with Himalayan spice rub, served until 4pm every Sunday.

seo.title: The White Horse Waterbeach
seo.description: Waterbeach's thatched coaching inn serving Nepalese cuisine, British pub favourites, Sky Sports and village events.
